title: Stepping Into the Darkness (CRS126)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Jill first shared on the podcast in October of 2019 about a home invasion and a very dangerous cave dive.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jill Heinerth, John LaSala, Kevin Allison)
